name: The 2nd Floor
review description: We had a terrific Mother's Day Brunch. Three-Course Menu was unique with just enough of a variety for everyone (i.e., kids) to find something they liked. Portions were not too large but not too small either. Wine pairings were a nice touch. Highly recommend The 2nd Floor.

name: Abacus
review description: Awesome Food, Great Wine and Drink List, Chef Rathburn, and his upper level Team makes his rounds and visits each table to greet them and Thank them for having dinner tonight. What a gem to find a place that takes the time to do this. Will return often and with many guest.

name: Afghan Grill
review description: Our third visit to Afghan Grill. The appetizer Sampler was a very generous portion for 4 people, and serves as a wonderful introduction to the menu. Also highly recommend the Aush, a hearty, highly flavorful soup. Personal service that was right on the money.

name: Al Biernats
review description: This place is just amazing. The first time my wife and I discovered this restaurant was three years ago and we just happened to be in town for a seminar, we live in L.A. So, we decided to look this place up online and were so happy to have found it, YES!! Food is so good that we couldn't leave Dallas before having a nice meal at this place. Food is outstanding, I am confident to say that all their dishes are fantastic, even though we've only had three of them... anyone's palate will definitely enjoy their dishes.

name: Arcodoro & Pomodoro - Dallas
review description: Food, presenttion and service all outstanding! Price was appropriate for value of meal.

name: Artin's Grill
address: 5840 Legacy Circle Suite D100 Plano, TX  75024
review description: As soon as we walked in the door and until we received our food, the only thing my date could say was 'pretentious' but all of this location (Legacy in Plano) is that way. Atmosphere reminded us alot of Houston's, Houlihans somewhat. It's not that it was bad but all in all it was 'just okay' Nothing out of the ordinary. I will say the service (or the waitress) we had was great, she was very attentive (yet not over the top), definately did not neglect us.

name: Asador
review description: Best porkchop I've ever had. The grilled peaches in the pork jus was amazing as well. Solid selection of beers as well. Will definitely go back again!

name: Asian Mint
address: 11617 N. Central Expressway Ste 135 Dallas, TX  75243
review description: This was out first experience at Asian Mint. We had a 7:30 dinner reservation on a Sunday night but weren't seated until close to 8 PM although the entire party arrived by 7:35. There was a party of 20 sitting near us which seemed to slow things down, and the wait staff seemed disorganized. We didn't eat until about 8:45. It's small and crowded - to the point where glasses and dishes were being knocked off other tables by accident and breaking. The food was very good except for their signature dessert (green tea cake) which was bland and tasteless. Half-off wine night was a bonus and the wine was very good. Recommended but not enthusiastically.

name: Avanti Ristorante
review description: This was a great place for an anniversary dinner. We tried everything from drinks to desserts and were well pleased. The staff was friendly and always working. I'd definitely recommend this place for a date night. Try the peanut butter and chocolate pie!

name: Baboush
review description: Delightful custom crafted cocktails. Delicious eats. Slow service however extremely courteous and knowledgeable about the menue.

name: Bailey's Prime Plus - Fairview
review description: Attractive atmosphere, delicious food, and impeccable service. I highly recommend the restaurant.

name: Bailey's Prime Plus - Park Lane
address: 8160 Park Lane Suite CX130 Dallas, TX  75231
review description: Great food and great service. The ambiance and atmosphere is what you would expect at a high-end steakhouse, very classy. This would be a great restaurant for a romantic night out.

name: Benihana - Dallas
review description: I was not happy with my experience there. I wanted to see the cook put on a show and have fun. We were rushed through the presentation and dinner. Not a fun time.

name: Benihana - Las Colinas
review description: I thought the Restaurant decor was nice, the managers and servers were great. And, the cook Fernando was handsome and performed an awesome show while cooking! However, it was super hot in the restaurant! Beginning by a grill made it that much hotter, so they definitely need to figure out a way to make it cooler. Other than that, I would go again in the future.

name: Benihana - Plano
address: 5840 Legacy Circle Suite D130 Plano, TX  75024
review description: We had a great experience. Went there for my husband's 35th birthday and everyone thoroughly enjoyed their meal. Our waitress kept our drinks filled and was very attentive. I've been to several hibachi places over the years, and I can say this was one of the best experiences. No complaints! :)

name: Bijoux
review description: We really liked having the choice of a half size entrees. The portions were not overwhelming, for a nice change. The food was excellent. The wine list was a little pricy.

name: Bijoux - The Chef’s Room
review description: Outstanding food and great service. The Chef's Room only has 6 or so tables, only half of which were occupied during our dinner. The Chef's menu offers a standard 5- or 6-course option or a 5-course vegetarian option. My wife and I opted for the standard menu with wine pairings, and after that the fun began. The service was spot-on, the sommelier was incredibly friendly and helpful, and we thoroughly enjoyed our dinner. Will definitely be back again, and not just for a special occasion.

name: Birra Poretti's - Arlington
review description: The lettuce in the salad was stale, the grilled chicken was completely dry. The servers were very attentive and nice, however this did not make up for the poor quality of the food. This restaurant should not be on Open Table.

name: Bistro N
address: 8687 North Central Expressway Suite 2000 Dallas, TX  75225
review description: There were 4 of us today for a lunch meeting. I'd been there before, but it was late afternoon or evening. A bit loud for a lunch meeting, but the food is worth it! Great salads and our server was unintrusive, which was very good with our meeting going on. I'll keep going and tell my friends as well!

name: The Blue Fish - Allen
review description: My family went to Blue Fish for a celebration. The food and plating was excellent. However, the plates they served it on were way too large for the table. We were shuffling plates, drinks, etc. all evening. While the place is popular, the music (techno style) was way too loud; it was hard to carry on a conversation. I would recommend if you go to enjoy your company, eat outside on their patio.

name: The Blue Fish Japanese Restaurant - Las Colinas
address: 925 W John Carpenter Fwy Irving, TX  75039
review description: Eaten there a few times over the last month. Definitely a little on the pricier side given location, but sushi is very good and well prepared

name: The Blue Fish Japanese Restaurant-North Dallas
review description: I took a friend here for his birthday. The food was amazing and the level of service was outstanding! Thank you so much for such a wonderful dining experience. We will definately be back!

name: The Blue Fish-Greenville Ave
review description: The Lobster Roll was delicious!

name: Bob's Steak & Chop House - Grapevine
review description: Food and service were wonderful!

name: Bob's Steak & Chop House - Plano
address: 5760 Legacy Dr. Suite B-1 Plano, TX  75024
review description: Loved the personalized attention offered us by Management Staff Kenny and Silvio, as well as subperb service from Chuck.Our Filets were butter smooth and melt-in-your-mouth delicious.

name: Bob's Steak & Chop House Dallas on Lamar
address: 555 S. Lamar Located in the Omni Dallas Hotel Dallas, TX  75202
review description: Bob's is by far the best steakhouse and the location on Lamar in the Omni is brand new and very unique

name: Bob's Steak and Chop House - Dallas on Lemmon Avenue
review description: since Bob sold this place the service has gone down. it took us for ever for the server to take our order. food is still good, but not the same treat it used to me.

name: Bob's Steak and Chop House - Fort Worth
review description: I loved the dining room as soon as I walked in! Cozy yet elegant. Noise level was low and you could easily carry on conversation with each other. The drinks from the bar were great followed by the excellent choice of appetizers. The shrimp cocktail and crab cake were the best! Our entrees were very good and we appreciated the input from our waiter on the specials. Desserts were wonderful! The chocolate/peanut butter sundae was our favorite and large enough to share! Would recommend for special occasion or out of town guests.

name: Boi Na Braza - Dallas
review description: Great Brazilian restaurant, salad bar was plentiful with meats, cheeses etc. Dinner rolls were exceptionally great. The different kinds of meat were excellent and all cooked and spiced perfect. It was a great meal for myself and my other 10 guests.

name: Bonnell's Fine Texas Cuisine
address: 4259 Bryant Irvin Rd. Fort Worth, TX  76109
review description: Our family took my sister here for her birthday celebration. The staff were very friendly and our server was knowledgeable and helpful. The ambiance was low key Western and pretty quiet--not too much noise. I had a super appetizer--grilled watermelon topped with grilled shrimp. It was delicious. My husband had the Texasfeller oysters that he really enjoyed. I had the trout entree; others at the table had the quail, the mixed grill, and the chicken stack. Everyone enjoyed it. We shared the dessert sampler. Had a nice pinot noir wine. We enjoyed the experience and would go here again.

name: Bonnie Ruth's Cafe et Patisserie
review description: We went on a Wednesday night for Ladies night. Great time and the food was wonderful!

name: Braza Dancante
address: 190 E. Stacy Rd Ste 1000 Allen, TX  75002
review description: The food was pretty good but the service horrible.

name: Brownstone
review description: The chicken fried steak was pricey, flavorless and thin meat. Wouldn't buy again. TWo others at my table liked the scallops and chicken fried chicken. My other guest didn't care for it or the house salad. Too little dressing and way too many onions. Probably wouldn't go back.

name: Buca di Beppo - Frisco
review description: We had a great experience at Buca. The service was great, the food was excellent, and we are looking forward to returning very soon.

name: Buca di Beppo - Park Lane
review description: We sat at the 'kitchen table' - actually in the kitchen! Service was fantastic, all the waiters showed us what they were serving and what was in it - a blast for everybody at the table. It's a little noisy, but worth it!

name: Buca di Beppo - Southlake
review description: Red Sauce was not as good as I remember it in the past.

name: The Butcher Shop Steakhouse
review description: The chef overcooked my steak at first, but the new one was brought out quickly. They even gave us a free desert to make up for it. Excellent service.

name: Buttons Food and Music-Addison
review description: I really liked everything there. The food is awesome, drinks are good and the band was hot. My only complaint is that we were asked to leave as they had another reservation for our table right as the band began to play. We were still ready to buy more drinks and listen to the band. We got there at 7:30 and the band didn't get on stage until 9 pm. With it being a Friday night there was no where to sit at the bar so we left. Which was unfortunate as we really wanted to stay hear the band and have a few more drinks. I will definitely recommend it and will be going back. I will just make sure to make a later reservation so that we can enjoy the band more.

name: Buttons Food and Music-Fort Worth
review description: I made resercvations for the Retro party and dinner! I soooo enjoyed the old song that you dont typically hear in a nightclub or dinner/supper club; I was not disappointed. I was tranformed by the outfits that were worn and the music! I would return again, especially for a retro party!The waitress, Hailey, made our night very enjoyable.

name: Buttons Place - Desoto
address: 209 E. Pleasant Run Road Desoto, TX  75115
review description: Loved loved the chicken and waffles with collard greens!! The best chicken EVER!

name: Cacharel Restaurant
address: 2221 East Lamar Blvd 9th Floor Arlington, TX  76006
review description: Great service - food is delicious. Elegant ambiance. The fixed price menu is versatile and offers great selection. This is my favorite restaurant in Arlington.

name: Cadot Restaurant
review description: This was our second visit, and it was just as good as the first. It's a casual, but very earnest place. My brother is becoming addicted to the cassoulet. If I lived in the area I would probably eat here weekly.

name: Café Greek Dallas
review description: The food is fantastic but the service was very slow or maybe just culturally relevant!Don't go if you are in a hurry!The atmosphere is more cafe style and outdated, could use a good sprucing up...BUT, again, the food was wonderful!

name: Cafe Malaga
review description: This is the third time we've been to Cafe Malaga, and it seems to get better each time. The outdoor dining is wonderful with live music on the weekends. The food is good. We had the paella this time, and gave it an 8 out of a possible 10. We'll go back when we want decent food and great atmosphere.

name: Cafe Modern
review description: Loved everything but the noise. REALLY loud. Service was adequate but not that attentive. Food and view were both amazing, will definitely go back.

name: Cafe on the Green at the Four Seasons Dallas
review description: Six business associates for dinner.The service was perfect. The food was perfect.Loud enough to cover our conversation and quiet enough we could hear each other without yelling.

name: Cafe Pacific
review description: Absolutely one of the most consistent restaurants in town. The only problem lunching here is deciding between slow cooked salmon or Asian chicken salad. They are both wonderful!!! Highly recommend! You won't be disappointed.

name: CampO Modern Country Bistro
review description: our experience was great! the service was very good; wait staff knowledgable & attentive without being annoying. The food was delicious; we had the lamb duo & the scallops. We will definitely be going back.

name: Cantina Texas
review description: Buffalo burger was boring. French frys were kind if tasteless. Ordered grilled veggies w kids meals aThey were butter sautéed squash. Mist kids hate squash. Green beans, brocolli, even peas and carrots would have been better for them.Server was great!!!

name: Capital Grille – Dallas – Plano
review description: Had a 7:30 reservation but didn't get seated until almost 8:30 but the manager took good care of us with a round of appetizers for our table of 10 people. Food was excellent as always and the waiter, Eddie, took very good care of us. Highly recommend for a fabulous steak.

name: Capital Grille - Dallas - Uptown
review description: Wonderful food and service as always.

name: Capital Grille - Fort Worth
review description: No one tells you valet parking is not available until after 6 pm our reservation was at 530 literally we drove around 30 mins trying to find a parking spotWe spent 350.00 for three people and the food was not even fit to take home to the dogWe had crab cake and calamari appetizers the calamari was okWe had spinach salad and tomato mozzarella salad both were okWe had tenderloin with lobster tail sliced on top overlooked sauce wasn't badBoth entrees of filet Oscar were cold and cooked medium rare but were so tuff and without flavor you couldn't eat itThe sides were all cold and clumped because they were cold lobster Mac and geese , au gratin potatoes, creamed spinachNo favor to any of the food bland and all entrees were cold

name: Cast Iron at the Omni Fort Worth
review description: The service was excellent. It is a romantic setting from the viewpoint of cozy booths and reduced lighting, however the openings to the lobby detract from that. The food was good. Solid and tasty but nothing special with the exception of the salad which was superb. The free valet parking is a very nice touch and the people watching is tons of fun. I would definitely go there again and think it is a good spot to take out of town guests as well.

name: The Cedars Social
review description: It's the Meddlesome Moth for more of a hipster crowd. Keeps getting better as it matures.

name: Central 214 - Hotel Palomar Dallas
review description: I had been back to Central 214 since Blythe Beck left, but I can tell you the food and menu are better than ever! The Redfish, pasta, sweetbreads, etc. all cooked perfectly.We will definitely be back. The new chef is outstanding.

name: Chamberlain's Fish Market Grill
review description: Chamberlain's Fish Market Grill is a great value. I think it is one of the very best restaurants for the money in DFW. Very good atmosphere, great food and very reasonable prices.

name: Chamberlain's Steak & Chop House
review description: There are so many steakhouses in Dallas, that it's been a while since I have been back to Chamberlain's. I had forgotten how good this restaurant is. The service was outstanding as were all the dishes that we ordered, especially given that it was a busy Saturday night.

name: Charlie Palmer at The Joule
review description: The best restaurant in downtown Dallas by far.

name: Citrus Bistro Seafood
review description: Not as good as in the past. Attention to food preparation fell below previous visits. Service was less attentive as well. In general, an off night.

name: cityhouse
review description: Filet was very good. NY strip.....not so much. Waiter had very little experience. Brought check to table without offering desert menu.

name: The Classic Cafe
review description: This was our first visit, but certainly not our last. We were celebrating my wife's B-Day.

name: Clay Pit - Addison
review description: Naan was the best part of our meal...

name: Cool River Cafe - Dallas
review description: The food was delicious. More outstanding was the service. Thank you for a very pleasant evening.

name: Copelands of New Orleans
review description: This is one of my wife's favorite places, and we've never had a bad meal here. Portion sizes are generous, and relatively inexpensive. Ask for a booth if you want privacy and low light. Nice atmosphere.

name: Craft Dallas
review description: Everything about this restaurant was fantastic. From the second we walked in until the second we left. The food was amazing with excellent service. As we left that day we were sad to hear from someone in the bar area that Craft was closing at the end of July 2012, I can only hope that this is not true.

name: Crossroads at House of Blues - Dallas
review description: Dropped in on a Wednesday night after attending a release party for a Samsung cell phone. The manager greeted us and offered a free desert. However, the service was very slow, the server we had not very energetic or helpful and the jambalya was fair at best. I guess this venue is good for music, but falls short as a restaurant.

name: Culpepper Steak House
review description: Always where you can enjoy a superior dining experiance fo any occasion.

name: Dakota's Steakhouse
review description: What a marvelous time my wife and i had at this wonderful restaurant! The food was excellent, the wine was great and the service was very timely and friendly! This really made our special night (Anniversary) one to remember!

name: Dallas Chop House
review description: The food was good and the service was good...just one exception. We had bought the AT&T performance package. When our entree's was served, it was only asteak with a clove of roasted garlic on the plate. We were not servedthe potatoes and mushrooms that was suppose to accompany that. I should have questioned the waiter, but didn't. I don't really understand how a mistake like that could happen.I was so sure later that we were suppose to get a side dish I checked it out on the webthe next day.

name: Dallas Fish Market
review description: fresh sushi, extensive wine by the glass selection, excellent service

name: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steak House - Dallas
review description: Too noisy. Televisions all over dining room, not great setting. Piano player or canned music at same time

name: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steakhouse - Ft. Worth
review description: I ordered a strip, medium rare. When it came, it was medium well, but it still tasted good. I mentioned to the waitress that is was overdone, and at first I thought I got the standard brush-off you often get when this happens, so I proceeded to eat.

name: Del Frisco's Grille - McKinney Ave - Dallas
review description: Food and service were excellent. Noise level was over the top - difficult to carry on a conversations. Also, the restaurant temperature was too hot. Some in our party were actually sweating. Need to crank up the air conditioner.

name: DISH - Dallas
address: 4123 Cedar Springs Road Suite 110 Dallas, TX  75219
review description: Food and service were outstanding. We will definitely go again to try more dishes. The wait staff was very attentative and helpful with selections.

name: Draft Picks
review description: Great place to watch a game. Drinks are somewhat expensive but service is good.

name: Dragonfly at Hotel ZaZa
review description: The service and the food were impeccable. Just the right amount of attention without feeling smothered or forgetten. The food portions were good and our server took the time to explain each special in great detail.

name: Dream Cafe
review description: Our large group of 12 went to DREAM CAFE for a pre-theatre dinner. Everyone raved about the unique menu and delicious food. The server was friendly, accommodating, and efficient. It was a great experience...one we would repeat!

name: Eddie V's - Fort Worth
review description: Very dark, a bit stuffy, overly formal for my taste.

name: Eddie V's Dallas
address: 4023 Oak Lawn Ave Suite 110 Suite 11o Dallas, TX  75219
review description: Great food and exceptional service

name: Edo Japan
review description: The food is very, very good. Most of the wait staff, except for one, isnt quite up to the task unfortunately. Knowing that going in, we still eat there at least twice a week. Lunch and dinner equally high quality. My wife gets sushi and the avocado salad, I the hibachi filet mignon (which you can get a a non-hibachi table). There's not enough parking, but there is now free valet on the weekends. We are going this afternoon with the whole family for Mother's Day. Can't wait!

name: Edoko Sushi
review description: As always great food and service... excellent place.

name: El Ranchito
review description: Food was just great! We were with other friends and they also like it.

name: Ellerbe Fine Foods
address: 1501 W. Magnolia Ave Fort Worth, TX  76104
review description: Once again Ellerbe's continues to impress us with a wonderful dining experience. The Summer Menu was full of items for all likings. The appetizers, especially the okra, were superb. Their wine list is simple and offers great wines across the spectrum. Desert menu could be amped up a little.

name: Ellie's Mexican Restaurant and Cantina
review description: Beef fajitas were awesome and the margarita was good. Patio was a little cramped, queso wasn't great, but pretty good little restaurant.

name: Fearing's
address: The Ritz-Carlton, Dallas 2121 McKinney Avenue Dallas, TX  75201
review description: Beautiful atmoshepere and excellent food and service!

name: Fedora Restaurant
review description: While pictures may be worth a thousand words (the pics on their site gave a good impression), but don't expect too much out of this place. The food was adequate; not great. The wait-staff performed like rejects from other finer establishments. As we went through our meal, we had to ask for our dishes to be taken way although pushed to the table perimeter (not hint enough). A dinner cocktail one person ordered was not made correctly, and instead of the bartender remaking the drink properly, the wait person took the drink back to the kitchen and "acted" as though she remade it -- it was not; we we were able to see her walk to the back and noticed what she did (or rather didn't do). Basically: All show, no substance and substandard quality.

name: Ferrari's Italian Villa
review description: Our business group meets several times each year at the DFW Hyatt Regency for a two day conference. We always look for a great restaurant near the hotel to kick things off. Ferarri's without question is the best we've ever found! From the warm greeting by the owner, the beautiful display of specials and appetizers, the spectacular wine list, the wonderful and creative menu to the superior service, this place cannot be beat! It was fantatic!

name: Ferre Fort Worth
review description: The chocolate cake was excellent. I had the shrimp with Parmesan grits. The shrimp was really good but the grits, I didn't like. I think it would have been better with mashed potatoes.

name: Five Sixty by Wolfgang Puck
review description: I must say, the only thing that saved this visit was the manager. When my wife and I first sat down we were greated by two different waiters, which was fine. They brought us some green beans that were very well done, and then our appetizer (calamari) which was awesome. I was under the impression that this was going to be a very memorable night. It was, but not in that sense. We ordered the steak which was the most expensive thing on the menu. My wife's came out rare (we ordered medium) and mine medium-rare. Had the manager not come out and taken care of everything like he did, I would never go back. He saved this visit and because of his service, we will return. Thank you Joshua for everything.

name: Four Winds Steakhouse
review description: Food was wonderful and our server, Bonnie, was fabulous.

name: The French Room
address: The Adolphus Hotel 1321 Commerce St. Dallas, TX  75202
review description: This is my favorite restaurant for special occasions. It's classy, the food is reliably excellent as is the service. It's expensive but you get what you pay for here.

name: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant - Park Lane
review description: Extremely noisy and busy with large parties. Fair service and fair food. I knew they had a vegetarian menu but it was never offered. I had to ask for it.

name: Gordon Biersch Brewery Restaurant - Plano
address: 7401 Lone Star Drive, Suite B120 Plano, TX  75024
review description: We love the beer and the burgers, great atmisphere

name: Grace - Fort Worth
review description: Jayme is the best waitress at Grace - amazing service and recommendations! Grace is the best restaurant in Fort Worth,Texas!

name: Grand Met
address: 2337 South International Parkway at DFW Airport, Terminal D Dallas, TX  75261
review description: I was there w/ my two kids. We wanted to catch the 7th game of the NBA Eastern Conference Finals. They went out of the way to accommodate us - set up a place in the lounge area - so that the kids can watch the game as we ate. Food was great and the service was excellent. Very attentive and always helpful. My kids loved the restaurant.

name: The Grape
review description: Excellent food (Sunday brunch)! Enjoyed the whole experience. Must make reservations!

name: Greek Isles Grille
address: 3309 N. Central Expwy. Ste. 370 Plano, TX  75023
review description: If you are looking for a casual, unpretentious restaurant that is focused on the quality and flavors of its dishes, look no further. This family-owned restaurant has been a staple of the DFW area for 18 years - not an easy feat in Dallas! We have been going to the Greek Isles for years and have never been disappointed.

name: The Grill on the Alley - Dallas
review description: Overall, it was a pretty good place and a good meal. I would say, though, for the price, there are probably better options. They had quite an extensive wine list. The food was above average to good and the service was exceptional; there were only a few tables taken on a Friday night at 8 pm. Sadly, the one behind us was and they were the loudest in the restaurant and, honestly, they were out of place. When you're paying a premium for a dining experience, you expect everything to be perfect: scale of 1 to 10...7

name: H3 Ranch at the Stockyards Hotel
address: 109 East Exchange Ave. Fort Worth, TX  76164
review description: The food was excellent! The noise was a little too loud, but I will be coming back!

name: Hannah's off The Square
review description: We had a great experience with the exception of the waiter. Alan seemed to be a little short with us and seemed to be a little full of himself.

name: Hibashi Teppan Grill, Sushi Bar
review description: I can't say enough great things about Hibashi. We have tried all of the other teppan tables in the area and this by far exceeds its competitors. They recently went through some staffing changes and things are drastically better. It is very obvious that management is finally focusing on service.....as their food has always been fabulous.

name: Hibiscus
review description: I've been to Hibiscus on several occassions and can honestly say the food is always delicious. It's a great place for a date or even to catch up with your girlfriends. I always recommend sharing the plates and trying several things out, especially the mac-n-cheese!

name: Houlihan's Restaurant - Arlington
review description: Great restaurant with amazing menu! The almond crusted tilapia is fantastic!

name: Houlihan's Restaurant - Dallas
address: 5225 Belt Line Road Suite 220 Dallas, TX  75254
review description: We love Houlihan's. Great food and excellent service by Heather. Would love to see some specials for dinner - if only on weekends. Thanks.

name: Houlihan's Restaurant - Garland
review description: Food quality and service were very good!

name: Howard Wang's Uptown China Brasserie
review description: As always, amazing service and food! This has quickly become my favorite Chinese food restaurant in Dallas!!!

name: III Forks - Dallas
review description: Excellent food with impeccable service. High end food but down to earth service; my 17-year old felt just as comfortable as he would anywhere else thanks to such great service.

name: India West Fine Dining & Lounge
review description: This is the best Indian restaurant in Dallas-Ft Worth. The service, ambiance, and food are all top notch. Everything we tried was fantastic. I have nothing but praise for the delicious food. I would describe the restaurant as romantic and intimate. They also have a nice outdoor seating area. On the weekends they have a piano player who plays everything from classical to current pop. She is very good. I really liked this place and can't wait to return.

name: J.R.'s Steakhouse
review description: The food was excellent, the service was 1st class!

name: Jasper's - Plano
address: 7161 Bishop Rd. Suite G-1 Plano, TX  75024
review description: Food and service good - had been better on other occasions, but still better than most restaurants

name: Jaxx Steakhouse
review description: Jaxx has a great menu & great service. I had not been there in many years. It is small and you tend to forget about it but so glad I came back!!

name: Jinbeh Japanese Restaurant
address: 301 E. Las Colinas Blvd Suite 301 Irving, TX  75039
review description: This was our 2nd visit to Jinbeh and we recommend this restaurant as a great place for sushi and teppanyaki. The chef this visit didn't season the food enough but it was still a great experience...we love that the chefs just cook and don't need to add all the banging of knives or throwing of rice.

name: Jorge's Tex Mex Cafe
review description: very enjoyable. we were 10 minutes late for reservation and hostess had a little attitude. I would have understood except it was not very busy.

name: Kenichi - Dallas
review description: Excellent server and very good food. LOVED the Travel Zoo coupon. Would not have driven to Dallas to try the restaurant with out the coupon.

name: Kenny's Italian Kitchen
address: 5100 Belt Line Rd Ste 764 Dallas, TX  75254
review description: Most say that Kenny's Wood Fired Grill is the best of the group, but I actually think Kenny's Italian is the best. Try the meatballs as an appetizer; you can't go wrong with anything on the menu. They have half price cocktails Monday nights.

name: Kenny's Wood Fired Grill
address: 5000 S Beltline Rd Suite 775 Dallas, TX  75254
review description: As always, the service and food was outstanding! I'm in the food and beverage industry, and Kenny's is a well run machine, dedicated to a great guest experience.

name: Kirby's Prime Steakhouse - Southlake
review description: Steaks were tender and cooked to perfection. French apple teat was served cold instead of warm. We will be going back

name: The Kitchen Table-Sheraton Dallas
review description: the breakfast buffet was not great. No pancakes, no waffles, no smoked salmon. Dissapointing because these are the items you would usually see at a high end hotel in a breakfast buffet.

name: Kobe Steaks - Dallas
review description: The food was tender and flavorful, the ambiance good. What happened to the shrimp sauce, though? That was ALWAYS my favorite!

name: Komali Restaurant
review description: Our favorite restaurant, over and over again.

name: Kona Grill - Dallas
address: 8687 North Central Expressway North Park Center Dallas, TX  75225
review description: As always, an excellent meal, with attentive staff and great food.

name: La Calle Doce
review description: Great atmosphere and service. The ceviche is excellent.

name: La Calle Doce - Lakewood
review description: Fantastic authentic Mexican seafood dishes. Enough kick for true spice fans and enough variety for non foodies. Highly recommend!

name: La Fiorentina
review description: We went to La Fiorentina for a friend's birthday dinner and were absolutely blown away by the service we received. We were greeted by the owner and promply seated. Our waiter was very knowledgable about the menu and wine list and was extremely accommodating. The food was delicious and I was very impressed with the variety of specials. I will definitely be back!

name: Landmark Restaurant - The Warwick Melrose Hotel Dallas
review description: Wonderful food from a large variety of choices. Impeccable and friendly service. Quiet, beautiful surroundings.

name: Lanny's Alta Cocina Mexicana
review description: Very Gormet , food selection excellent and plenty of choices. Presentation and service top notch. On par with the Zaggats best around Country.

name: Lavendou Bistro
review description: We love this great little gem in the neighborhood. Been going since it opened in 1996 and it has been consistent every time.

name: Lawry's The Prime Rib - Dallas
review description: My husband and I really enjoy going to Lawry's although it is certainly a special occasion place for us. It is such a treat! We love the spinning bowl salad and of course the prime rib! Don't under estimate the cheaper glasses of wine. We had a lovely time celebrating our anniversary in a romantic setting but mainly the food is absolutely incredible.

name: Lefty's
review description: Good food. Reasonable price and good service. Noisy.

name: Local
review description: The food at Local was enjoyable, but the service ruined the dining experience. I went with a large group on a Saturday night, and accomodated a change in our group size the day prior. We arrived and waited over 40 minutes to have our drink order taken, and by that time our water glasses were empty. Our server only came after we brought this to the attention of the hostess and was not apologetic. The wine we selected from an already limited wine list was out of stock. The food would have received an "excellent" review, except the lamb that several people at our table ordered was overcooked. Of note, it was brought out at about the pace of the drinks. I want to want to come back, but don't know that the service is worth it.

name: The Loft at NYLO Plano at Legacy
review description: First time and what a surprise to find such a funky restaurant in a hotel - reminded me of the W's we've stayed before. Service was a bit slow but the food was great - when it got there. Luckily we weren't in a hurry. A portion of our order never arrived but the tapas we had ordered were sufficient. Despite the minor hiccups, we'll come back again.

name: Lombardi's Cibus
review description: Excellent butternut squash pasta! Fun, well designed restaurant; always attentive service.

name: Lonesome Dove Western Bistro
review description: Had their signature steaks along with signature salad. Delicious!

name: Lucile's
address: 4700 Camp Bowie Blvd Fort Worth, TX  76107
review description: We went during crab fest, 1lb of crab makes a great meal.Enjoyed the quiet sunny atmosphere and friendly service.They have the best cold martinis here, served with a small carafe ofextra martini in an ice bucket on the side.Only criticism would be the corn on the cob side was soggy.

name: Mac's Steak and Seafood Colleyville
review description: When we got there they said that they did not show a reservation for us. But said they would have a table in 5 to 10 minutes. They did.Food was not a good as normal. But they tried to make it better. Excellent service. Managers took great care of us. We will always go back.

name: Mac's Steaks & Seafood Arlington
review description: So consistently good and has been for years.

name: Maggiano's - Northpark
review description: $12.95 pasta special (get one now, and and get a complimentary order to take home) was a HUGE hit with our group of 11. Great food, always enjoy eating here.

name: Maggiano's - Willow Bend
review description: The restaurant seemed overwhelmed from the hostess that discourteously told us we would have to wait even though we had reservations to the lack-luster service once we were seated. The food was good, and the apple dessert was excellent. We also enjoyed the complimentary take-home entrees the next day. We are willing to give them another try, but only because the food was good.

name: Maguire's North Dallas
review description: The pistacio crusted mahi mahi and shrimp and grits were fantastic. We look forward to going back for seconds.

name: The Mansion Restaurant at Rosewood Mansion on Turtle Creek
review description: The Rosewood Mansion Restaurant on Turtle Creek was delightful. The service is impeccable and the food was outstanding. My mother and I had a wonderful time.

name: Manuel's Creative Cuisine
review description: what a wonderful restaurant. don't let the name make you think this is just a Mexican restaurant. Manuel's lives up to its name as far as creative cuisine. For example who would have thought of a blueberry basil mojito? I would highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Marquee Grill & Bar
review description: From the moment we were seated in a spacious booth, I could tell this was going to be a special experience. Michael and Bernard were solid servers. The manager, Jeff, welcomed us tableside and wished my wife happy birthday. As for Tre's food, it was the most balanced and well thought out I've enjoyed in five years. The lump crab and spicy calamari were great starters. My bride enjoyed her shrimp and grits entree, while my smoked pork chop was absolutely the best. The portion sizes were sufficient and the prices were very fair for such quality. I will go back as soon as I can.

name: Maximo Cocina Mexicana
review description: Great restaurant! AC was out, which caused some discomfort. They brought in portable units, but it was still hot.

name: Meddlesome Moth
review description: Our server was very opinionated, to the point of saying some menu selections were bad choices. We were waited on relatively quickly after we arrived but the service was all down hill from there. Other waitstaff bought our food, were were never asked if we were enjoying ourselves/ if the food was good etc. We waited 20+ minutes after completing our meal to be asked if we would like dessert/were ready for a check. They were busy but there were also empty tables and it wasn't a weekend. Too bad because 3/4 dishes we ordered were above par.

name: Medina Oven & Bar
review description: The food was great and fresh. We enjoyed everything we ordered. Its very authentic. If I lived in Dallas I would go here regularly.

name: The Melting Pot - Arlington TX
address: 4000 Five Points Blvd., Suite 119 Arlington, TX  76018
review description: We had a great time. Our waiter was the best. Would highly recommend it to everyone!!!

name: The Mercury
review description: Everything was perfect. Food, staff, table location, noise level- we were able to talk and me heard which was nice for a business dinner.Food could not have been any better. I had the tuna which was heavenly. Prices were just fine for the quality. Some places charge equal and don't deliver- Mercury delivered. Can't wait to go back and try some other menu items.

name: Mercury Chophouse
review description: Waiter served the men first every time water, menus, salads , entree and dessert. He was spending his time talking to other waiter or waitresses at the computer just a few feet from our table. Food was good but nothing outstanding. Not in any hurry to return.

name: Mercy Wine Bar
address: 5100 Belt Line Rd Suite #544 Dallas, TX  75254
review description: As always, a fun night out. The food and service are consistantly great -- and the wine slection is awesome!!

name: Mesa Veracruz Coastal Cuisine
review description: Service started out pretty slow. Took a while to get our drinks and to order. Food is on the salty side for me but was still very delicious. Chef came out to greet everyone. Very friendly.

name: Meso Maya
review description: They food was medicore. I would rate Gloria's and MiCocina higher. Service was unattentive even when the crowd vacated. Ordering food at the bar took three requests (chips and salsa.. come on!).

name: Mi Dia From Scratch
review description: Thoroughly enjoyable I will come back

name: Mi Piaci
review description: The food was delicious! Nice atmosphere and wonderful dining experience. Thanks!

name: Michaels Cuisine
review description: Had a great time at Michael's as always. Had a new waitress this time and some things were a bit odd. Wine was very good for the price, was a house special this night. Had the pork chop and it was massive and quite good. My wife had the Redfish special and it was a large portion as well and also very well executed.

name: Mignon - Prime Steaks, Seafood and Cocktails
review description: There was a wedding rehearsal party in the main area with a band. We were seated in a separate room but they would not shut the door for a more relaxing dinner. Our waiter was slow, my husbands's meal was late, then he got my husband's order wrong, our dessert came 30 minutes after our meal. I go there often and have always had great service. I guess they are not used to having an event and having their normal dinner guests at the same time

name: The Mint Dallas
review description: This was my first visit to The Mint and after reading the positive reviews, I was disappointed in my $25 lunch as was my dining companion. Service was fine but our server didn't utter a word to us other than, "Something to drink?" I had the salmon in curry which was fine but for $20, I expected more. Great location and atmosphere/design is excellent. The place was packed. Maybe I just ordered the wrong thing....would give it another try.

name: Momo's Pasta - Addison
review description: We've been going to Momo'sfor years...the food is consistently excellent,atmosphere, very pleasant and the staff WONDERFUL.

name: Momo's Pasta Dallas
review description: Great homemade pastas!! Wonderful service!!!

name: Monty's Corner
review description: Excellent job of staying in touch with the customers.

name: Morton's The Steakhouse - Dallas
review description: I've been going to Morton's now for a couple of years. And I have loved it until I went this last Friday which was July 20th. I usually get the steak and seafood. I found that that Morton's had went up on there dish which I didn't like. But they also took away some food or decreased the portion size. So they increased the price and took away food. That's not right. I spoke to the manager a woman aNd she pretty much told me that it was corporate that changed it and that dish was made for the less fortunate during the economy fall. So that was rude. I felt she was calling my poor. I spend 160 dollars. And she called me poor. I won't be going to Morton's anymore.

name: Mr G's
address: 2334 North International Parkway Terminal C DFW Airport, TX  75261
review description: This place is right out of a movie, a movie you wish you were in. I can't even explain this place in a way that does it justice. It is comfortable, quit, dark and wonderful. The entire dining room has a mahagony-red glow and feels like you are in a classic gentleman's lounge. The steak had a good pure flavor without over seasoning and was prepared just as I asked. The lobster bisque had a nice complexity to it and very large pieces of lobster mixed in with the caviar garnish. The scotch selection was disappointing but it had a good port selection.

name: NAAN SUSHI JAPANESE RESTAURANT
review description: The food was absolutely outstanding. The prices seemed a bit on the high side, but when you see the sizes you'll realize that most (not all) of excess price is worth it. I wish we had had more time to fully enjoy our meal however we were in a bit of a rush, and our server kept disappearing on us. It was a bit frustrating. But otherwise we definitively enjoyed our food when we were there and probably will be back when we have more time.

name: NAAN Sushi Uptown
review description: Excellent sushi place! Service could have been better but there was a table of 50 there so I am sure that took away from a lot of others. Def will still be back though.

name: Next Wood Fired Bistro & Vino Bar
review description: The food was really good but service poor. It was Saturday night and there should have been more waiters.

name: Nick & Sam's
review description: Everything was great until the end. My wife and I were celebrating our 9 year wedding anniversary and were very impressed with Nick and Sam's. Went to leave and valet lost our car. They tagged our white car as a black car and had trouble finding it. Had to wait awhile which usually is not too big a problem except we were late to our next reservation. Dinner and service was exceptional in the restuarant.

name: Nicola's Ristorante
address: 5800 Legacy Drive, Suite C1 Plano, TX  75024
review description: Awesome food. Swordfish and scallops were delicious, as was the seafood risotto. Chef Sasha did a wonderful job. Will definitely eat here again soon.

name: Nobu Dallas
address: Hotel Crescent Court, 400 Crescent Court Dallas, TX  75201
review description: Service is top notch and the food is awesome!

name: NOSH euro bistro
review description: this was our second trip to Nosh. We arrived about five minutes late and ended up at the bar for at least 30 minutes. I spoke with the owner and he told me he could not remove people from a table, which I appreciated...but then.... He was,however, most attentive with our table and made sure we were happy with the rest of the evening.

name: Nosh Euro Bistro-Plano
review description: Good food in Plano. Don't let the "strip mall" location fool you. This place is one of the best in town. Try the sea bass for two; they often offer it as a special.

name: Nusta's Cafe
address: 1730 W. Randol Mill Rd. Suite 146 Arlington, TX  76012
review description: Was everything I expected and more. Wait staff was very friendly and patient, explained all of the dishes to us and even gave us a history on some of the dishes. The food was delicious and the presentation was actually better than the pictures on the website. This was our first experience with Peruvian cuisine and we will definitely be making this a regular stop .

name: Oak
address: 1628 Oak Lawn Avenue, Suite 110 Suite 110 Dallas, TX  75207
review description: Will definitely eat here again!!!!

name: Ocean Prime - Dallas
review description: My wife and I celebrated our 13th wedding anniversary at Ocean Prime. We did not know what to expect, as it was recommended by my manager. We found our experience to be delightful. There were rose petals shaped like a heart on the table when we arrived. The staff acknowledged our anniversary over and over again. The wait staff was excellent and the food was wonderful. My wife especially loved her scallops and her shrimp cocktail. Our waiter was knowledgeable and helpful. Everything was 5 star. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great place to celebrate an anniversary or any other significant event. Very romantic evening. Great job Ocean Prime.

name: Oceanaire Seafood Room - Dallas
review description: We were enteraining an out of town guest and used Opentable to make the reservation while enroute to the resturant. After arriving and checking in with the host we were seated immediately although 30 minutes early. The meal was excellent as usual.

name: The Old Warsaw
review description: Old Warsaw served the best asparagus soup I have ever had; all the food was perfect and so was the service as well.

name: Olenjack's Grille
address: 770 Road to Sixflags Drive St. 100 Arlington, TX  76011
review description: the initial server abandoned my party. creamed corn pureed,good flavor but no resemblance to corn. sandwich bread,1pc. dry no oil or butter,other pc.1/2 tsp.on half of bread,certainly not even a slather..desserts very good otherwise..forgetful..both my companion and I said we would not see a reason to revisit Olenjack

name: One2One Restaurant & Bar
review description: First visit for me; my date occasionally visited the lounge/bar for live entertainment. It was a very enjoyable experience. Service was impeccable; our waiter was quite knowledgeable and my date, who was raised in a fine dining environment, appreciated his suggestions. It was almost empty when we arrived early (6:30) on a Saturday, since we wanted plenty of time to chat and peruse the menu. Quiet enough for one of the chefs to overhear my date's animated and informed comments regarding the menu items and wine list. He surprised us with some delectable morsels that even my unrefined palate was able to appreciate. Menu included 'cordon blue' selections, along with simpler fare (mac n' cheese and delicious pizzas); all reasonably priced!

name: Palm Restaurant - Dallas
review description: Great food, great service, but the decor is really tacky and needs to be updated ASAP. I realize the decor has no connection with the food, but it really kills part of the experience, all these caricatures on the walls need to go.

name: Palomino - Dallas
review description: On this most recent visit (in late July), the air conditioning wasn't working correctly. By the end of the evening, everyone in our party was sweating. Apparently the problem didn't just start that day - which I regard as an inexcusable failure by the management.

name: Pappas Bros. Steakhouse
review description: I took my wife here for her birthday. We have been to all of the other Pappas restaurants and received the same great service.

name: Patrizio
review description: The bellini's are wonderful. My chicken scallopine was very good. We went for an early dinner to celebrate my Mother's 81st birthday and the music was so loud we had to constantly ask them to turn it down, we could barely hear ourselves think. Can't remember our waitress' name but she was very good and adorable.

name: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille - Uptown
review description: Had a great time. I had been to the Perry's in Austin and wanted to take my mother and sister there for the Pork Chop. We all loved it!

name: Piccolo Mondo
review description: As always, the food was fresh and fantastic and the wait staff was incredible.

name: Place at Perry's
review description: Excellent Food and Service. Salvadore, our waiter was excellent, very attentive & informative

name: Posado's - Plano
review description: It is a Pretty Good Resturant. Kids like it because of the free Ice Cream, however the ice cream machine was not working right. Other than that it was great...

name: The Poule at the Joule
review description: A colleague recommended this spot for a brunch I had with an out of town guest. I've lived in Dallas 8 years and had never been here. It was very relaxing and perfect for Spring and Summer weather. Next time I'm bringing my bathing suit! EXCELLENT service and atmosphere.

name: Primebar
review description: Service I received on this visit was EXCEPTIONAL.... I am there almost every Sunday, but had begun to gravitate away because of the noise (music/dj)... I always have a group of 8-15 and we like to converse and catch up on the week, this wasn't possible the last two weeks because of the noise level, but this last week, we sat at the table in the bar which was away from the speakers, so it was quite enjoyable

name: Primo's Bar and Grill
review description: I almost drove by it, because I was traveling out of town. All of the staff were very friendly & the food was delicious ! I will definetely recommend it to anyone.

name: Private Social
review description: Food was amazing! Wait staff very helpful and knowledgeable with everything on the menu. Menu changes with the seasons so worth going back just to see what unique items will be on the next one. Went on a Monday and was very quiet and relaxed so not sure how it would be on a weekend but regardless the food and service is worth it.

name: Pyramid Restaurant and Bar
review description: Our server was attentive and respectful. The food was excellent. The steak was cooked exactly to my request and was outstanding topped with bleu cheese. Even the Caesar salad was very good. It was nice and quiet, which was perfect for a business dinner.

name: Rafain Brazilian Steakhouse
review description: The service was highly impressive. The staff was so attentive. The food was DELICIOUS. We will definitely return.

name: The Ranch at Las Colinas fka Cadillac Ranch Restaurant
address: 857 West John W Carpenter Freeway Irving, TX  75039
review description: Delightful venue, but the actual food left a bit to be desired. My prime rib was excellent, the "smoky" fried chicken less so, the Kobe beef tacos so-so, the stacked brisket buns very messy, and the Texas onion rings perfectly battered and fried . . . but so large that it was difficult to actually eat them. Wonderful service, Tito's Iced Tea was fantastic, and the wine list was adequate.

name: Randy's Steakhouse
review description: I bring my family to Randy's probably 3 to 4 times a year.I was very disappointed in the total service, atmosphere and quality of food.First of all on the quality of the food that was served to us.The filets were all(3) under cooked. I am a little flexible on mine so I did not send mine back. My wife's (ordered medium) and daughter's (ordered medium +) did get sent back. Bad mistake. My wife's came back almost well done and my daughter's came back still rare on the one side but almost well done on the other. Also the outside was burnt.Terrible - and if that isn't enough. We told the waiter and nothing was ever done. Never heard from anybody the rest of the night - I was expecting staff to come appologize.We will not be back

name: Rathbun's Blue Plate Kitchen
review description: This has become my favorite restaurant in Dallas. Grandma Minnie's fried chicken is excellent. The starters continue to get better (new favorite is the pimento cheese). Even the bread basket is a delight. I bring everyone here when I have friends come into town.

name: Reata
review description: The carne asada was wonderful. The house specials on the beverage list for wonderful as well. Awesome waitress.

name: Remington's Seafood Grill
review description: Awesome, fresh seafood at a fantastic price.

name: Restaurant AVA
review description: Loved the fresh ingredients on the menu. Also love the weekly changing menu. A great find in Rockwall!

name: Ristorante Nicola
review description: I will return to this restaurant because it is not so loud as many. Our group of 4 could actually have a conversation without screaming.Good place!

name: RJ Mexican Cuisine
address: 1701 N. Market Street In the West End Dallas, TX  75202
review description: Lots of menu options, but not your typical Mexican food. Delicious and our server was awesome! Very friendly, helpful with menu choices.

name: Royal Sixty
review description: Delighted to know about Royal Sixty. Fun atmosphere - good food, but service was slow and uncertain. Almost awkward. They weren't crowded, either.

name: Roy's Plano
review description: Service was excellent and the pre-printed menu card with our name and anniversary was a very nice touch. Food was excellent. Definitely a special occasion place for us.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Ft. Worth
review description: Highly recommend the cowboy Ribeye Steak - to die for !!!

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - North Dallas
review description: Ruth's Chris' Steakhouse is still the best steak in Dallas.

name: Saint Ann Restaurant and Bar
review description: First time to eat at Saint Ann's and we loved it.

name: Salum Restaurant
review description: Really enjoyed the entire meal and experience. The wine list has some gems at a reasonable (not excessive) markup.

name: Sanford House
review description: A great meal while we were in town for a short tip. Picked the location based on recommendations from OpenTable. The food was amazing and the service was more than we could have asked for. All of the comments about the Chocolate dessert are right on and it was a great end to the meal. Both our appetizers and entrees were perfectly cooked and the extras made the meal. If we are ever back in town we will be back for sure.

name: Screen Door
review description: The food is excellent - although pricey for "comfort food". Pork chops were huge - grilled -potatoes au gratin, remarkable. Went before theater - very close - walking distance. Thought I had paid only $5 the week before to park with the Valet to go to another restaurant next door before going to the theater - not sure why it was $8 this time.

name: Seasons 52 - Plano
address: 7300 Lone Star Drive, Suite C100 Plano, TX  75024
review description: We were using a voucher that we received from American Express. Portions were just right. Excellent food. Strawberry kir royale was great. We will go back

name: SÉR Steak+Spirits
address: Hilton Anatole 2201 Stemmons Freeway Dallas, TX  75207
review description: Nana was a little more 'old school' than we expected, but it seems that's about to change. We actually caught their current set up on it's last night. I actually enjoyed the smartly dressed staff and the lovely place settings. I thought the food was good, though it ranged from just 'good' with a couple of stand outs. We're definitely interested in checking it out after the remodel to see how the experience differs.

name: Sevy's Grill
review description: Like it every time we go with friends. Service is perfect as are all staff inside and valet with their friendliness and smiles. Makes one feel as if they are happy to have you there.We have never been disappointed.

name: Sfuzzi
review description: Great wine and delicious pizza...both make for a great combination!

name: Sfuzzi - Las Colinas
review description: Great place for business lunch. The portions were great. Calamari was excellent.

name: Shinsei Restaurant
review description: Had heard so much about this place and was excited to finally go. Calamari and spring rolls were really very good. The rest of the meal went down hill from there. No flavor. service was mediocre at best. Really really loud, not the place for a romantic dinner.

name: Silver Fox - Fort Worth
address: 1651 S. University Dr. Fort Worth, TX  76107
review description: The Silver Fox does it right! The staff was well organized, professional, and welcoming. The atmosphere was classic, not too upscale and not too casual. To top it off the food was spot on. Just the right portions and the plate presentation was perfect, not to mention it was quite tasty! We enjoyed celebrating our anniversary here and will most certainly recommend to others.

name: Silver Fox - Grapevine
review description: Our experience at Silver Fox in Grapevine is always wonderful. We go there to celebrate Special occasions. The food Is consistently fantastic. We are treated like royalty by the entire staff. Even the manager/proprietor comes to every table to make sure our experience is everything we wanted and more. My wife and I reserve The Fox for spoiling each other. July 18th was our 37th anniversary. Of course, we celebrated it at Silver Fox in Grapevine and it was just as fabulous as every time before. We have never had a complaint about anything at this marvelous place.Try it. You will return as often as you can.

name: Silver Fox Steakhouse Frisco
review description: Our waitress was great. She made the experience great and was very helpful with the menu.

name: Silver Fox Steakhouse Richardson
review description: Not particularly great. We prefer Houston for price and quality

name: Simply Fondue - Ft Worth
address: 111 West 4th Street Suite 15 Ft. Worth, TX  76102
review description: This was an incredible dining experience. We had two waiters, one of which was in training. We had great interaction with both and they were amazing. They were very fun and entertaining. We were unsure of what to get since only 1/2 of us had ever done fondue. The training waiter took over and made great suggestions to help us plan our meal. He made excellent wine and beer suggestions that complimented the food nicely. We were there over 3 hours and it seemed like 45 minutes. This is due to fact that we were having such a great time! The waiters were very patient with us every step of the way. Now, on to the food. The appetizers were amazing! The main course was so filling and dessert was heavenly! You need to eat here, but with a group!

name: Sissy's Southern Kitchen & Bar
review description: Enjoyed the food! Fried chicken was wonderful and worth returning for. Shrimp and grits were decent but not as authentic as expected. Only complaint is the noise level. Once the room began filling up, it was too difficult to carry on a conversation or hear anything the wait staff or my wife had to say. Outside on a busy street waiting on the valet was very much welcomed with a much quieter environment. I hope they can address the noise factor as I would only return off peak times in hope of a lighter crowd.

name: The Southfork Hotel
review description: Mother's Day brunch. Not nearly worth the price of admission. Added gratuity to the price. Service was terrible. Drinks empty for long periods. Brought kids cups with no lids. I ended up going to the server station multiple times to refill my tables drinks. I would have left little or no gratuity for a buffet meal where drink service was bad.

name: The Standard Pour
review description: Really enjoyed my cocktails. Was happy to see our reservation was honored because it was very busy. I think its more of a bar with food than a restaurant. To be considered a restaurant, another page of menu selections for food should be offered. I will definitely come back - for snacks and drinks.

name: Steel
review description: Food very good - wines half price on Sundays; a good deal. Desserts always excellent

name: Stephan Pyles
review description: Food was great but service a lot left for improvement . The waiter spilled soda on me & apologized but sheepishly served us the rest of the night. There was no offer of paying for dry cleaning for my dress or taking something off the bill. Poorly handled this situation and this left bad impression on restaurant . Even though the meal was good the service ruined the experience for me!!

name: Steve Fields Steak and Lobster Lounge
review description: service was just ok. steak was delivered but had to wait 3-4 minutes for a steak knife.

name: Sushi Zushi - Dallas
review description: Great sushi.. didn't feel rushed at all but service was quick and attentive

name: Sushi Zushi of Southlake
address: 1420 E. Southlake Blvd Suite 168 Southlake, TX  76092
review description: Very broad menu. Good sushi. Overall a great experience.

name: Suze Restaurant
review description: Neighborhood gem for us. Location next to Albertsons not great but, once inside, delicious food and service. Packed house on a Tuesday night which says a lot. Brussel sprouts salad was tasty. Soft shell crab not really up to par with rest of dinner. Sticky toffee pudding was so divine, we nearly licked the plate.

name: T/X Restaurant
review description: On Friday, July 20, my family and I dined here. My family was visiting from Germany, and the waitress let us know that the chef was from there as well. He came to speak with us, and explained their dishes in German for them. It was a nice gesture, and completely unexpected. We tried the special, and were amazed! The food was very creative, and presentation was lovely. We all had a great experience. Thank you so much to the chef and staff for our dining experience.

name: Technique at Le Cordon Bleu - Dallas
address: 11830 Webb chapel Road Suite 1200 Dallas, TX  75234
review description: Went to the restaurant with ten ladies from the garden club and we had a great time. We had to sit at two table instead of having one big table and that was a bit of a bummer but we survived and the food was delicious. I will go there again soon - actually we all want to.

name: TEI-AN
review description: Excellent Japanese food! Will definitely go back!

name: Texas
review description: Amazing food! Service was great, too! We tried it out for our anniversary and will definitely be coming back.

name: Texas Spice
review description: We went to Texas Spice for dinner, on the 4th of July. This happened to be one of the few restaurants that was open that day. We tried the dinner buffet. The selections and food was good, nothing out of the ordinary. We ordered a couple of drinks and they turned out fine. The restaurant changes an automatic 18% gratuity on the buffet, even for parties with 2 adults and a 4 year old. For that level for gratuity the service is definitely lacking - it was slow and erroneous. We were initialy charged for our 4 year old, after bringing that to the attention of the waiter he took it off, but still somehow managed to keep the original gratuity amount on it. So, another round of corrections, before we could pay and be out of there.

name: Tillman's Roadhouse - Dallas
review description: will go again for atmosphere not necessarily for the food.

name: Tillman's Roadhouse - Fort Worth
review description: Tillmans is a wonderful place! We enjoyed our dinner and drinks. I had an amazing chefs special lump crab crusted filet that you could cut with a fork!!! We will be going to Tillmans again in the near future!!GREAT PLACE!!

name: Tokyo Cafe
review description: This is your place if you want consistently great sushi and variety. Tok fries are a must. Dan Dan was great. Sushi was superb. Fresh and pleasantly presented.

name: Townhouse-Dallas
review description: I was really looking forward to going to the Townhouse but I was disappointed. Everything was just OK.

name: Trevi's Restaurant - Omni Mandalay
address: 221 Las Colinas Blvd East Irving, TX  75039
review description: My 16-year old twin daughters and I were guests at the Omni Mandalay and dined at Trevi's on Friday, July 6th at 9:30 a.m. for breakfast and what a treat! We ordered their fabulous French Toast w/carmelized bananas which was to die for and the pancake breakfast which included eggs, bacon and hash browns. The fresh fruit tray was exceptional as well. The service far exceeded my expectations. We definitely had to return the next day for breakfast which included their buffet offering made to order omelet's! We will return soon.

name: Triniti at Tower Club
review description: Definitely a wonderful restaurant. Go there for the beautiful views of Dallas.

name: TruFire Kitchen & Bar
review description: Great meal. Very helpful service. Interesting menu options.

name: Truluck's Seafood, Steak and Crab House - Addison
review description: Magical!!! We went for my wife's birthday - and WOW! Incredible food - delicate tastes that harmonized perfectly from one dish to the next. A great find for "foodies" - and we will DEFINITELY be back.

name: Truluck's Seafood, Steak and Crab House - Dallas Uptown
review description: Great meal for a special occasion as it is quite pricey. We ordered a variety of items and everyone was please with their food. You won't have room left, but order the carrot cake for dessert - it was delicious!

name: Truluck's Seafood, Steak and Crab House - Southlake
review description: Honestly, I have a pretty bad track record with more expensive restaurants. It seems they usually serve food that I could get for a quarter the price, or even less, with servers more concerned with their own etiquette than with your dining experience. This was not my experience here. The service was great, and the food was phenomenal. I've already recommended it to several of my friends.

name: Via Real
review description: Great dinner with colleagues. Diego was super. Peach creme brûlée was perfect.

name: Victory Tavern
review description: Great spot for pre-concert or game drinks, but skip the food and do dinner elsewhere! Limited menu wasn't the best. I had a burger and truffle fries, both were ok, but my hubby's chicken dish left much to be desired! Location is key...just a few steps from the AA Center...

name: Villa O
review description: Great as usual, which is why we're there every Sunday!

name: Vineyard Steakhouse & Skybar
review description: Was expecting good food but it turned out to be exceprional. The grits are delicious and the steaks are superb. Skybar has a nice view and the waiter brought complementary champagne and sorbet throughout our meal which added a nice touch. Will definately go back... A little pricey. A two person date featuring appetizer, two entres, wine and one desert was around $135. Very nice place though.

name: The Wild Mushroom
review description: You seldom see the Chefs out and about the restaurant - delivering the plates, visiting with the customers. That is a definite PLUS! Makes the diner feel very special. The food was excellent, drinks were a little weak and the young hostess must've been new and we confused her by wanting to sit side-by-side in a booth. We asked the waitress to take our picture to commemorate our anniversary. A few minutes later, she delivered complimentary champagne - how gracious! Loved It!! Will return for Special Occassions.

name: Wild Salsa
review description: I was told this was outstanding traditional mexican food. Ordered 3 of their tacos (at $2.50-$3 a piece) and i thought they would be more than two bites each. Seriously there was a total of 6 bites between the 3 tacos. 2 tachos@ with rice and beans (3" by 3" bowl) are $8, and 3 are $12. At $2.50 a piece, you really pay $3 for the rice and beans on the smaller portion and jump to $4.50 on the $12 plate. I am not impressed. It was nothing to write home about. On the upside, their chips are amazing!

name: Wildcatter Steakhouse
review description: Food was perfect, along with what is probably the best scenic views in all of North Texas! Truly a special place.

name: Winewood
review description: While the noise from the bar area was a little more than I would have liked, the jazz guitar still carried through without being overbearing. The food was great, the waiter very attentive, and the menu was difficult to narrow to a single choice. We are not wine snobs, but found the list to be more than adequate. Winewood is a little more expensive than a regular stop for us, but is a top runner for special occasions.

name: Woodfire Kirby's - Dallas
review description: Food was good- service was bad.

name: Woodshed Smokehouse
review description: The food was WONDERFUL! We had a group of 6 and we ordered the beef shin. It says this serves 4... we each had 2-3 tacos and were full and ended up going home with a TON of leftover meat! Enough for another meal of 6 for sure! It was delicious and I would definitely recommend ordering it with a group. We also had the white fish dip and the hummus - both very tasty. The only thing I would've liked to be different would be to have some a/c inside... it was 100+ degrees outside when we went.. although the fans helped.

name: Y.O. Ranch Steakhouse
review description: There are many, many better steakhouses in Dallas. The service, atmoshere and most importanly food was just average...

name: Yao Fuzi Cuisine
address: 4757 West Park Boulevard Suite 108 Plano, TX  75093
review description: It was too Americanized. Was looking for original chinese cuisine -- didn't even have chopsticks. Service was slow, confusing and they mixed drinks up twice - one was that I ordered Clo du bois wine - said it repeatedly and pointed to it and they charged me for La Creme - which was $4 a glass more expensive! Sweet and sour shrimp had such a thick, sticky and too sweet a sauce, no one who ordered it could finish it, nor wanted to do so. When I walked in and said my name for reservation, they mixed that up and accused me of getting their too late (reservation was for 6:30) and I told them my reservations were at 7:00 pm (and we were there at 7pm) and even received an email confirmation.... irritating from the beginning. Very disappointed!

name: Yellow Rose Steak and Chop House
address: 890 Parker Square Dr Flower Mound, TX  75028
review description: Overall I felt this was a "Good" experience, however the food was a little less than I expected. I ordered the Ribeye and while this cut should be expected with moderate marbling, this particular cut I received had extreme amounts (25% waste). Clearly the chef should have trimmed this cut prior to cooking.

name: Ziziki's -  Plano
review description: I eat out two or three times a week but it had been a few years since I had dined at Zikiki's. We enjoyed Ziziki's as something different. However, it won't become one of our "regular" places. The tables were shoved too close together, making it less than cozy; and the noise level too high for my (and my date's) comfort. This was a Friday evening -- that may partly explain the noise and the crowd. I think we are a little more sensitive to noise than most people.

name: Ziziki's - N. Dallas
review description: This is a favorite neighborhood restaurant. The ambiance is that of a 5 star restaurant. The lighting is perfect and there is always a nice bustle to the place. The wait staff has been there a long time and are experienced servers. They know when to approach and when not. Service has always been top notch. The food is wonderful and always consistent. I have never been disappointed.

name: Ziziki's - Travis Walk
review description: Good food, good service, good location - while nothing was outstanding on its own, the overall experience was terrific!

name: Ziziki's Taverna
review description: Fun and great service. We were in town and decided to try a late evening dinner and drink destination. Server was friendly and helpful and food, drinks were great. We'll definitely go back!

name: Zodiac at Neiman Marcus – Downtown Dallas
review description: The Room was decorated beautifully. Our lunch was delicious and our service was perfect. Thank you for a very special occasion. Jo Ann Laird (Mrs. Calvin Laird)
